text:
- Add a method to generate crypto tokens for use as Bearer tokens
- Add a method to verify an incoming crypto token and unpack the header and
  claims
- Uses the JWT library

This is not JWT token support, merely a way to generate Bearer tokens that
won't have to be stored in a database but can self-validate and store
additional information that you see fit.
title: Add crypto token capability

title: Add crypto token capability

text: Sorry about all the chatter on this one... for some reason I forgot to test for Python 3+, I think I have the fixes ready but since I've muddied up this PR going to close this one and open one with a new single commit so that your repo history is cleaner if you end up merging it.

Add crypto token capability

* Add a method to generate crypto tokens for use as Bearer tokens
* Add a method to verify an incoming crypto token and unpack the header and
  claims
* Uses the JWT library

This is not JWT token support, merely a way to generate Bearer tokens that
won't have to be stored in a database but can self-validate and store
additional information that you see fit.
Switch to PyJWT which is Python 3 compliant
